00035 
00036         //
00037         // Pure virtual implememtation
00038         wxString GetTypeString() 
00039         { 
00040                 switch( m_board_variant)
00041                 {
00042                 case BV_VME:
00043                         return _("V1740");
00044                 case BV_DESKTOP:
00045                         return _("DT5740");
00046                 case BV_NIM:
00047                         return _("N6740");
00048                 }
00049                 return _("XXX740 undef variant");
00050         };
00051 
00052         CVT_V17XX_TYPES GetType() { return CVT_V1740;}
00053 
00054         double GetClockMHz() const { return CVT_V17XX_BOARD_CLOCK_KHZ[ CVT_V1740_BOARD_CLOCK_INDEX]*0.001;};
00055         int GetSampleBit() const { return 12;} 
00056         double GetVolt2Bit() const { return ((double)( 1<< 16)) / 2.00;};               // HACK TBV
00057         UINT8 GetChEnableMsk() const 
00058         { 
00059                 switch( m_board_variant)
00060                 {
00061                 case BV_VME:
00062                 case BV_DESKTOP:
00063                 case BV_NIM:
00064                         // The number of channels per group is the same for every board variant
00065                         return 0xff;
00066                 }
00067                 return 0x00;
00068         }
00069         bool GetBoardMemory( UINT32 &num_ksamples_per_channel);
